author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

I was never a big fan of the army of cut plugins in the Egamma ID department, so I'd like to suggest replacing some of them with a more general cut class based on the cut parser. One could generalize further, but I didn't want to take too many steps at the time and risk causing differences.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles and local matrix tests pass. There are no changes expected.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No backport intended.
title: New GsfEleEBEECut class to generalize some ElectronIdentification cuts
